title: spirit guard udyr, profile art
body:
hey im thinking of buying spirit guard udyr but i was wondering how i could make it into my profile background, if i can anymore. i dont see any icons regarding the skin on sale or that its available on the skin description.
if i was to say buy ezreal it says in the description that you will get an icon + profile banner/background.
please help im conflicted if i should buy him or not.

replies.body: Spirit Guard Udyr should give you the icons as well, and using those icons I believe does make that your profile banner by default as long as one of those icons are used!
